data.title: St. Paul's School
data.meta_description: Welcome to the Visitor Center for St. Paul’s School. St. Paul’s School is located in Concord, New Hampshire, a city of 36,000 that is the state capital as well as the political and financial center of the state. The campus is located within close driving distance to the vibrant downtown, with its eclectic array of restaurants, shops, independent movie theater, and performing arts center. The 2,000-acre campus is ideally situated within an hour’s drive to Boston, the seacoast, and the majestic White Mountains.
data.text:
Welcome to the Visitor Center for St. Paul’s School. St. Paul’s School is located in Concord, New Hampshire, a city of 36,000 that is the state capital as well as the political and financial center of the state. The campus is located within close driving distance to the vibrant downtown, with its eclectic array of restaurants, shops, independent movie theater, and performing arts center. The 2,000-acre campus is ideally situated within an hour’s drive to Boston, the seacoast, and the majestic White Mountains.

Visitor Policy

Campus Map

Take a Virtual Tour

Directions to Campus

St. Paul’s School is located at 325 Pleasant Street in Concord, N.H., off I-89, Exit 2. At the end of the ramp, turn right onto Clinton Street. Follow signs and take left onto Langley Parkway. Continue to end to the intersection of Pleasant Street (across from Concord Hospital). Turn left onto Pleasant Street. Go about a half mile and turn left at the St. Paul’s School sign onto Dunbarton Road.

Important parking information

Admissions parking is located in Lot E. Once on campus, continue STRAIGHT through the stop sign at the intersection of Library Road. Lot E is on the right. Follow the signs down the path to the Admissions Office.

Parking is also available in Lot D adjacent to the Athletic & Fitness Center. The Admissions Office is located in the Sheldon building on Library Road.
